title: Restaurant
detail: Enjoy a fine dining experience with a diverse menu of local and international cuisines. Our restaurant offers a cozy ambiance, perfect for family dinners, romantic dates, or business meetings.

title: Coffee Shop
detail: Relax and unwind at our coffee shop, serving freshly brewed coffee, teas, and pastries. Whether you're catching up with friends or working remotely, our coffee shop is the perfect spot.

title: Souvenir
detail: Take home a piece of your journey with our unique souvenirs. From handmade crafts to locally sourced products, our souvenir shop has something special for everyone.

title: GYM
detail: Stay fit and active during your stay with our state-of-the-art gym facilities. Equipped with modern machines and free weights, our gym caters to all your fitness needs.

title: SPA
detail: Pamper yourself with a rejuvenating spa experience. Our spa offers a range of treatments, including massages, facials, and body scrubs, designed to relax and refresh your mind and body.

title: Saloon
detail: Look your best with our professional salon services. From haircuts and styling to manicures and pedicures, our skilled stylists are here to help you feel confident and beautiful.

title: Juice Bar
detail: Refresh yourself with a variety of healthy and delicious juices, smoothies, and shakes. Our juice bar uses fresh, organic ingredients to create the perfect blend for your taste buds.

title: Swimming Pool
detail: Take a dip in our sparkling swimming pool, perfect for a refreshing swim or lounging by the water. Our pool area is equipped with comfortable seating and stunning views.

title: Helipad
detail: For our esteemed guests arriving by air, we offer a fully functional helipad. Enjoy the convenience of direct access to our facility, ensuring a seamless and luxurious experience.
